youtube:
Lati wa alaye RTMP rẹ fun YouTube, wọle sinu akọọlẹ YouTube rẹ lẹhinna lilö kiri si ṢẸDA> Lọ laaye. Iwọ yoo wo iboju atẹle yii:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Da "URL ṣiṣanwọle" ki o si fi sii sinu aaye "Lẹẹmọ RTMP URL nibi". Nigbamii, daakọ "bọtini ṣiṣan" ki o si lẹẹmọ si aaye "bọtini ṣiṣan". Tẹ "Lọ Live" lati bẹrẹ ṣiṣan ifiwe.
{1000}
facebook:
O le sanwọle si profaili rẹ nipasẹ RTMP lati oju-iwe Ṣẹda Live Facebook (ati titẹ Ṣẹda Ṣiṣan Live) tabi nipa tite bọtini Live ni agbegbe Ṣẹda oju-iwe tabi profaili eyiti o fẹ lati sanwọle. Iwọ yoo mu wa si Olupilẹṣẹ Live Facebook.
Yi lọ si isalẹ ni isalẹ ẹrọ orin awotẹlẹ. Rii daju labẹ "Bẹrẹ" pe akojọ aṣayan silẹ ti ṣeto si Lo Awọn bọtini ṣiṣan. Iwọ yoo wa URL RTMP ati bọtini ṣiṣan fun irin-ajo yii. (Akiyesi: Awotẹlẹ fidio rẹ tun han ni igun apa ọtun isalẹ.) {{facebookLive}} Daakọ "URL olupin" ki o si fi sii sinu aaye "Pae RTMP URL nibi". Nigbamii, daakọ "bọtini ṣiṣan" ki o si lẹẹmọ si aaye "bọtini ṣiṣan". Tẹ "Lọ Live" lati bẹrẹ ṣiṣan ifiwe.
{1000}
